general_advisory: Farmers are advised to grow short duration Rabi crops like green gram, black gram, cowpea, field pea, lentil, groundnut, toria, and sunflower in medium/shallow lowlands utilizing the available soil moisture in the field. Farmers are also advised to visit their crop fields regularly to check pest infestation.

advisory: For flowering to physiological maturity stage of paddy, control Ear Head Caterpillar with suitable pesticides.
Manage Gundhi Bug in paddy fields by spraying appropriate insecticides.
During physiological maturity/harvesting stage, store groundnut in polythene-lined gunny bags with desiccants.
Apply recommended chemicals for internode borer management in groundnut.
To manage internode borer during ripening stage, split Trichogramma chilonis cards at weekly intervals.
Spray recommended chemicals like Fipronil or Chlorantraniliprole for borer management.
Control fruit fly in cucurbits using poison baits prepared with appropriate chemicals.
For cauliflower and cabbage, manage fertilizers properly to ensure healthy growth.
To manage Red Spider Mites in Marigold and Rose, spray suitable chemicals for effective control.
